# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth significantly more than its asking price. I believe it could greatly benefit and enhance your life or work in numerous ways. Considering its exceptional quality and versatility, I am extending this exclusive offer to you for $150. This is an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a special rate. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
